item.description: Welcome to my Academy Notes This site contains all of the meaningful notes that I composed over the course of the academy.

item.title: ðŸª´ Quartz 3.3
item.description: Host your second brain and digital garden for free. Quartz features Extremely fast natural-language [[notes/search|search]] Customizable and hackable design based on Hugo Automatically generated backlinks, link previews, and local graph Built-in [[notes/CJK + Latex Support (æµ‹è¯•) | CJK + Latex Support]] and [[notes/callouts | Admonition-style callouts]] Support for both Markdown Links and Wikilinks Check out some of the amazing gardens that community members have published with Quartz or read about why I made Quartz to begin with.
